bugs.summary: Remove or update probes expiring in Firefox 100: MEDIA_RECORDER_*
have PresShell::GetVisualViewportOffset() either return a maybe or layout scroll offset if vv offset is not set
Stop saving print settings in platform code after printing
Remove the code supporting saving print setting from the content process
Scroll snapping to center doesn't appear to work properly in Firefox on Monterey
Move platform-dependent parts of RWLock to mozglue
Page still flashes dark on navigation on windows with layout.css.prefers-color-scheme.content-override=1 and browser.display.use_system_colors=true (on Windows by default)
Introduce reliable isPrivileged flag in ExtensionData
